therian.util

Class Types

  • java.lang.Object
    • therian.util.Types

  • public class Types
extends Object

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Type refine(Type type, Type parentType)
      "Refine" a declared type: If type is a TypeVariable, return its normalized upper bound. If type is a WildcardType, return its normalized upper bound.
      static Type resolveAt(Object o, TypeVariable<?> var)
      Tries to "read" a TypeVariable from an object instance, taking into account BindTypeVariable and Typed before falling back to basic type
      static Type resolveAt(Object o, TypeVariable<?> var, Map<TypeVariable<?>,Type> variablesMap)
      Tries to "read" a TypeVariable from an object instance, taking into account BindTypeVariable and Typed before falling back to basic type.
      static String toString(Type type)
      Friendlier string formatting of types that appends brackets for array types.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

             TypeVariable<?> var,
             Map<TypeVariable<?>,Type> variablesMap)
